tool_description: Returns extensive list of business categories.
name: Business Categories
title: Business Categories

api_list.name: Business Categories
api_list.description: Returns a list of business categories
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://business-categories.p.rapidapi.com/business-categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "business-categories.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://business-categories.p.rapidapi.com/business-categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "business-categories.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
